data.description: Extracts info on BZFlag servers and players
data.PS: The following links are only valid for module list maintainers:
data.rationale:
I believe that BZFlag::Info is a good namespace choice for this
    module, because there are no modules related to BZFlag in CPAN yet,
    and I plan to create more modules in the future, which I believe
    should go under the rootlevel namespace BZFlag.
